events.name: Minnesota Wild at New Jersey Devils

headlines.description: — Nico Daws made 29 saves, Paul Cotter, Brenden Dillon and rookie Arseny Gritsyuk scored and the New Jersey Devils beat the Minnesota Wild 4-1 on Wednesday night for their sixth straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nico Daws makes 29 saves, Devils beat Wild 4-1 for 6th straight victory

events.name: Detroit Red Wings at Buffalo Sabres

headlines.description: — Jack Quinn had a goal and two assists, Colten Ellis stopped 27 shots in his NHL debut and the Buffalo Sabres beat the Detroit Red Wings 4-2 on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Colten Ellis stops 27 shots in NHL debut as Sabres beat Red Wings 4-2

headlines.description: — Mike Matheson scored on a one-timer off Ivan Demidov's crossing pass a minute into overtime to give the Montreal Canadiens a 2-1 victory over the Calgary Flames on Wednesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mike Matheson scores in overtime to lift the Canadiens past the Flames, 2-1
